cast.overview: A departing professor gathers his closest colleagues for an intimate farewell, but the night takes an unexpected turn when he shares a stunning secret about his past. As the conversation unfolds, skepticism and curiosity collide, challenging everything they thought they knew about history, science, and belief.
cast.title: The Man from Earth

details.biography: Alexis thorpe was born in Newport Beach, California. She made her acting debut on "The Young and the Restless" (1973), after which she moved onto film projects including, Desert Vampires (2001) and Pretty Cool (2006) and fell in love with films. So she has decided to leave "The young and the restless".  IMDb Mini Biography By: Nicola Smith
details.name: Alexis Thorpe
